exports.name: EventBus
exports.description: In-memory publish/subscribe event bus. Methods: subscribe, once, unsubscribe, publish, clear, getSubscriberCount, listEvents.

exports.name: EventHandler
exports.description: Handler signature for events: (payload: T) => void.

exports.name: EventBusOptions
exports.description: Configuration options for EventBus constructor (maxListeners, debug).
